title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete, copy, show, create.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, embed, tool-calling, structured output, JSON mode.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with OpenAI-style endpoints, model manager, RAG, voice input.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, tab completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses Ollama for local code completion and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) and Docker Compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama: generator, chat, embedder components for pipelines.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy support for Ollama: standardize OpenAI-like calls across 100+ local/cloud models.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service wrapper that exposes additional endpoints for batching, webhooks, and auth on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP bindings to Ollama’s API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bot integration for Ollama: DM or mention to chat, supports streaming and model switching.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server that exposes Ollama as a tool for Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama’s REST API.
